Title: Bandhan Bank share price falls over 9% after MD & CEO resigns; Jefferies downgrades stock, cuts target
Description: The board of directors of Bandhan Bank on April 05 took on record the letter submitted by its Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer Chandra Shekhar Ghosh informing that he would retire from the services of the Bank as the MD & CEO upon completion of his current tenure on July 09, 2024.

Title: Bandhan Bank's Ghosh not to be part of board post retirement
Description: Explaining the rationale behind this sudden decision to step down, Ghosh clarified that it was a voluntary decision and that the RBI had no role to play in this.

Title: RBI imposes penalty on Bank of India, Bandhan Bank
Description: The penalty on Bank of India has been imposed for non-compliance with the RBI's directions related to 'interest rate on deposits', 'customer service in banks', 'interest rate on advances', and contravention of provisions of Credit lnformation Companies Rules, 2006.

Title: Dabholkar murder case | Sisters of accused: ‘Celebrated Rakhee at home on day of murder’
